contents.item: Where you are today and where you want to be lies a gap. That gap is the price you have to pay to get to the top.
I loved him the way some people are to be loved - from a distance.
irony is for a traveler while traveling, happiness increases as the distance increases.
She was like the Sun. At just the right distance, she gave me life, but if I got too close, she would burn me.
When you have mountains in the distance or even hills, you have space.
contents.owner: Robert M. Pirsig, Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance: An Inquiry Into Values

contents.item: distance is created by time is further than space
The eye of judgment sees at a distance what it refuses to see in it's own reflection.
contents.owner: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

contents.item: He ran from one side of the cage, and then back again, which was not very far. It was far only if you were a puppy.
contents.owner: Michael Delaware, Blue and the Magical Forest: The Power of Hopes and Dreams

contents.item: It is always the same. Whether you are walking or going by train, the way always seems shorter the second time than the first. (And that is true of distances that are not to be measured in miles and yards.)
If i think about us logically, there is no chance for us. But logic doesn't produce magic.
Social networking platforms drove man closer to those in neighboring continents, while driving him further apart from those in his neighborhood.

I know love is dark work; you have to get your hands dirty. If you hold back, nothing interesting happens. At the same time, you have to find the right distance between people. Too close, and they overwhelm you; too far and they abandon you. How to hold them in the right relation?
When we were in bed, the only part of me she touched was my penis, because it was the most detached.
contents.owner: Anatole Broyard, Kafka Was the Rage: A Greenwich Village Memoir

contents.item: Always distance yourself from gossip because it's the worst form of self-disruption.
Geography and mileage mean nothing. Separate is a single word that covers all distances that aren't together.
contents.owner: Rivera Sun, Steam Drills, Treadmills and Shooting Stars - a story of our times -

contents.item: Our main business is not to see what lies dimly at a distance, but to do what lies clearly at hand.

We criticize mothers for closeness. We criticize fathers for distance. How many of us have expected less from our fathers and appreciated what they gave us more? How many of us always let them off the hook?
For time is the longest distance between two places.
Be able to back up a car for a considerable distance in a straight line and back out of a driveway.

In 1952, I had gone to England on a literary pilgrimage, but what I also saw, even at that distance from the blitz, were bombed-out ruins and an enervated society, while the continent was still, psychologically, in the grip of its recent atrocities.
